welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kidbrooke, a charming town known for its quaint streets and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the hidden gems this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet travelers, offering luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the main hub for all commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and corporate flights, providing exclusive services and facilities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, offering services for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for 45 minutes. After that, you can purchase additional time or use the free Heathrow Express Wi-Fi.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Southend Airport is primarily used for low-cost carrier flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
